New Records: Jason Heyward hit a go-ahead, two-run homer and made a dazzling defensive play as the Houston Astros beat the Seattle Mariners 4-3 on Tuesday night to clinch their fourth consecutive AL West championship.

Post-Match Reflections: The Houston Astros beat the Seattle Mariners 4-3 on Tuesday night to clinch their fourth consecutive AL West championship.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Daikin Park in Houston, Texas, with an attendance of 38,195.
Others: Logan Gilbert started for the Mariners and Framber Valdez started for the Astros.
